程序包的使用
com.whaleal.mars.core.query

  • 使用com.whaleal.mars.core.query的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.whaleal.mars.core.messaging  
    com.whaleal.mars.core.query  
    com.whaleal.mars.core.validation
    Copyright 2020-present Shanghai Jinmu Information Technology Co., Ltd.
    com.whaleal.mars.gridfs

  • com.whaleal.mars.core.messaging使用的com.whaleal.mars.core.query中的类 
    类和说明
    Query
    MongoDB Query object representing criteria, projection, sorting and query hints.
  • com.whaleal.mars.core.query使用的com.whaleal.mars.core.query中的类 
    类和说明
    Collation
    Central abstraction for MongoDB collation support.
    Collation.Alternate 
    Collation.AlternateWithMaxVariable 
    Collation.CaseFirst 
    Collation.CollationLocale
    ICU locale abstraction for usage with MongoDB Collation.
    Collation.ComparisonLevel
    Abstraction for the ICU Comparison Levels.
    Collation.ComparisonLevels
    Simple comparison levels.
    Collation.ICUComparisonLevel
    Abstraction for the ICU Comparison Levels.
    Collation.PrimaryICUComparisonLevel
    Primary-strength Collation.ICUComparisonLevel.
    Collation.SecondaryICUComparisonLevel
    Secondary-strength Collation.ICUComparisonLevel.
    Collation.TertiaryICUComparisonLevel
    Tertiary-strength Collation.ICUComparisonLevel.
    Converter 
    Criteria
    Central class for creating queries.
    Criteria.BitwiseCriteriaOperators
    MongoDB specific bitwise query operators like $bitsAllClear, $bitsAllSet,... for usage with Criteria.bits() and Query.
    CriteriaDefinition
    定义 Criteria 以后会派生各种 相关标准 Criteria
    LazyStreamable 
    Meta
    Meta-data for Query instances.
    Meta.CursorOption
    Meta.CursorOption represents OP_QUERY wire protocol flags to change the behavior of queries.
    Meta.MetaKey 
    MongoRegexCreator 
    MongoRegexCreator.MatchMode
    Match modes for treatment of String values.
    Projection
    Projection projection.
    Query
    MongoDB Query object representing criteria, projection, sorting and query hints.
    Sort
    Sort option for queries.
    Sort.Direction
    Enumeration for sort directions.
    Sort.NullHandling
    Enumeration for null handling hints that can be used in Sort.Order expressions.
    Sort.Order
    PropertyPath implements the pairing of an Sort.Direction and a property.
    Streamable
    Simple interface to ease streamability of Iterables.
    Term
    A Term defines one or multiple words Term.Type.WORD or phrases Term.Type.PHRASE to be used in the context of full text search.
    Term.Type 
    TextCriteria
    Implementation of CriteriaDefinition to be used for full text search.
    TextQuery
    Query implementation to be used to for performing full text searches.
    Update
    Class to easily construct MongoDB update clauses.
    Update.AbstractModifier
    Abstract Update.Modifier implementation with defaults for Object.equals(Object), Object.hashCode() and Object.toString().
    Update.AddToSetBuilder
    Builder for creating $addToSet modifier.
    Update.BitwiseOperatorBuilder 
    Update.BitwiseOperatorBuilder.BitwiseOperator 
    Update.Modifier
    Marker interface of nested commands.
    Update.Modifiers
    Modifiers holds a distinct collection of Update.Modifier
    Update.Position 
    Update.PushOperatorBuilder
    Builder for creating $push modifiers
    UpdateDefinition
    Interface fixing must have operations for updates as implemented via Update.
    UpdateDefinition.ArrayFilter
    A filter to specify which elements to modify in an array field.
